member.name: P:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.Controllers.ReportDesignerControllerBase.ReportDesignerServiceConfiguration
member.summary: Gets or sets the configuration of the web report designer service.
member.remarks: When inheriting the ReportDesignerControllerBase controller basic configuration is needed. Provide an object implementing the in order to configure the service. This should be done in the controllers' constructor using static object to preserve the configuration between requests or using dependency injection.

member.summary: Represents the report controller configuration.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.WebApi.ReportDesignerControllerConfiguration.RegisterRoutes(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Registers report controller's routes in the application configuration.
member.param: The application configuration to add the routes to
member.remarks: Registers report controller's routes with the default "api" first path segment.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.WebApi.ReportDesignerControllerConfiguration.RegisterRoutes(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration,System.String)
member.summary: Registers report controller's routes in the application configuration.
member.param: The application configuration to add the routes to

The first path segment to include in the route template. For example, "api" is the default literal path segment in the "api/{controller}" route template. Use this overload and pass a unique path segment (e.g. "reportingapi") to avoid collisions with other Web API services. Then modify the report viewer client to use the custom service URL address.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ReportDesignerServiceConfiguration.DefinitionStorage
member.summary: Gets or sets an implementation instance that will be used to open, save, and list available report definitions.
member.remarks: Use this property setter in order to provide a report definition storage instance. Set a built-in definition storage implementation or a custom implementation. This is mandatory setting without defaults.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ReportDesignerServiceConfiguration.SettingsStorage
member.summary: Gets or sets an implementation instance that will be used to list and save the available database connections.
member.remarks: Use this property setter in order to provide a database connnection storage instance. Set a built-in database connection storage implementation or a custom implementation. This is mandatory setting without defaults.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ReportDesignerServiceConfiguration.ResourceStorage
member.summary: Gets or sets an implementation instance that will be used to list and save the available resources.
member.remarks: Use this property setter in order to provide a resource storage instance. Set a built-in resource storage implementation or a custom implementation. This is not a mandatory setting with default location - the DefinitionStorage's location.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.param: The object that should be validated.
member.remarks: This method is used internally from the web report designer service.

member.name: T:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ResourceStorage
member.summary: Represents a resource storage to resolve report resources from local directory.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ResourceStorage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates a new storage for report resources.
member.param: The base directory where the report resources are stored.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ResourceStorage.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Creates a new storage for report resources.
member.param: The base directory where the report resources are stored.
Mapping between resources' extensions and their store directories in the file explorer.

member.name: P:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ResourceStorage.BaseDir
member.summary: Gets the base directory used to access the report resources .

member.name: M:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ResourceStorage.GetAllByExtension(System.String[])
member.summary: Lists all report resource files found in the baseDir folder specified in the constructor or the dictionary with extension directories.
member.param: The search strings to match against the names of files in the path. This parameter can contain a combination of valid literal path and wildcard (* and ?) characters, but it doesn't support regular expressions.
member.returns: A list of all report resource file names and full paths present in the specified directory.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ResourceStorage.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Finds a report resource file by its name. The name is the full filename (with extension).
member.param: The report resource filename (with extension).
member.returns: The contents of the report resource encoded in base-64 format.

member.name: M:Telerik.WebReportDesigner.Services.ResourceStorage.Save(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates new or overwrites an existing report resource file with the provided resource bytes.
member.param: The report resource filename including the file extension.
The new bytes of the report resource.
member.returns: The location of the resource file.
